en.title: FusionExcel Continues To Make Waves in Australia!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR PATRICIA THAVA.

FE Draws Big Interest at Sydney's Mind Body & Spirit Autumn Festival 30th April - 03rd May 2009!

FE's double booth F48 was a draw card for hundreds of visitors at the recent four day Mind, Body & Spirit Autumn Festival in Sydney. Everyone was amazed by the power of FE's Quantum Pendant when shown the "Balance Test" and the "Mobile Phone Test". Staged at the prestigious Sydney Convention Centre in Darling Harbour, FusionExcel took part for the second time in this festival and was led by PD Patricia Thava. She was supported by NZ Country Licensee Josy Doyle and Director Suzan Manan along with many Sydney FE members. 

Many visitors to the booth showed keen interest in the images of the water crystals and Dr Emoto's work with FE's CEO Paul Ting. They are very impressed and confident with FE's products, as Dr Emoto is well known in Australia with his popular book "Hidden Messages in Water" and the movie “What a Bleep?" 

On the eve of the MBS Festival, PD Patricia Thava and Director Suzan Manan gave an hour long radio interview to Sydney FM 101 radio station, popular with the Australian Filipino community explaining and answering questions on FE's Quantum Science products. This interview was streamed worldwide live via the internet. Several FE members listened to the interview in Malaysia. A big thank you to FE members Julieta Chin who made this possible. 

Overall, the Sydney MBS Festival drew a record crowd of 16,000 people and the FE double corner booth F48 was a hive of activity – busy and bustling with "demos" and "water tests". The impressive backdrop and FE balloons drew instant attraction to the booth. FE products were well received with keenness in the products and interest to try. 

The Event also provided an excellent frontline opportunity for new members like Matt Canham, Lisa Wong , Julieta Chin and Evelyn Zargoza who did a great job attending to the visitors, confidently carrying out demos and developing greater knowledge about FE's products in the course of answering numerous and varied questions from equally interested visitors. 

A special appreciation to Clinton for providing logistics support to the FE Sydney expo team and a warm welcome to our new FE Member, Sydney soccer and rugby coach, Steve Harris. 

FE Australia's forthcoming event is the Adelaide Body Mind & Psychic Festival on 30th and 31st May, followed by the Melbourne Mind Body & Spirit Autumn Festival and Christchurch NZ Expo in early June.
